UserInfo.title: userInfo
UserInfo.description: A summary of the specified user, including the user's ID, username, and full name.

privileges.title: Privileges
privileges.description: A list of the returned permissions or access controls, and the features that grant the privilege, if applicable.

accessSummaryParameters.title: accessSummaryParameters
accessSummaryParameters.description: Parameters to initialize the access summary component to load the relevant user permissions
